fr.cnrs.iees.graph

Class NodeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.GraphElementAdapter
      • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.NodeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphElement, Node, Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleNodeImpl

    public abstract class NodeAdapter
extends GraphElementAdapter
implements Node
    A base implementation of Node with all the methods that should be universal in descendants

    gignoux - 16 ao√ªt 2017
